title: Queen of Spades: Through the Looking Glass
overview: The sinister ghost of the Queen of Spades is out for blood, her victims the students of an old boarding school shrouded in gloomy rumors.  Exploring the schoolâ€™s abandoned wing, the teenagers discover a mirror covered in mysterious drawings.  Facing it, they playfully recite an incantation which renders their innermost desires a reality - at the expense of nothing less than their souls.
